name: Resting Prince
description:
Story

Once upon a time, there was a prince / king / whatever that could sometimes have terrible nightmares where he felt like he was suddenly falling to his death.

Help this poor soul to fall asleep the right way.

Controls

C to navigate through menu

X to dash 

left / right arrows to move

Trivia

I discovered Pico-8 with this jam, making this game, in only 2-3 days (yeah, I was late, blame on me) but it was hella fun and I'm going to try way more things now that I am done with this first project.
